description: Aundair is a land filled with fertile farmlands and powerful mages.
The floating towers of Arcanix are the finest institute for studying magic in Khorvaire.
Magic is very common in Aundair, from magically moving plows to cleansing stones in every village.
The Knights Arcane are an elite unit of eldritch knights, and the spies of the Royal Eyes of Aundair specialize in divination magic.
characteristics: Every Aundairian should know a little magic.
Why use your hand when you could use mage hand? Why strain your muscles tugging on a bowstring when you could use a wand?

Don’t settle for common clothes and a squalid meal when you could wear glamerweave and drink the finest wine. If you’re a fighter, focus on finesse instead of crude strength. And never miss an opportunity for a clever quip.
Some Aundairian nobles are bound by arcane pacts handed down through generations. A few remarkable heirs develop into warlocks.
lastWarSynopsis: Although small, Aundair was able to remain a powerhouse of the war due to Queen Aurala's aggressive development of magical development.
The Eldeen Reaches succeeded from Aundair halfway through the war due to high taxes, taking one half of Aundair’s land and one fifth of its population
homelandPrompts: How do you utilize magic in your daily life?
Are you bound by an arcane pact?
What is your opinion of the Eldeen Reaches and Thrane after they took so much of your land from you during the Last War?
Do you only seek the finest clothes and food?
